name: ULIFE - OPENWORLD LIFE SIMULATOR
description:
A NEW EXPERIENCE

Ulife is a game of no limits. Explore space or experience the open-world that boasts over 50 activities. All this detail is offered in a quality 2D text-based experience with very few limits.

REVOLUTIONARY NEW WORLD

Ulife offers the biggest map of any 2D text-based life sim. You will always have something to see, do or experience. With such a big and diverse open-world environment there is always a mystery or a detail yet to be uncovered. Both the land and sea is included in unparallel detail that is unrivalled in the text based genre.

ALWAYS SOMETHING TO STRIVE FOR

Content is a big focus for Ulife. There are dozens upon dozens of assets to buy so you will never feel like there is a lack of content. The content ranges from micro cars and supercars to military jets and interactive police cars and much more.

! PLEASE CHECK ON THS PAGE REGULARLY TO CHECK FOR UPDATES !

ANDROID VERSION - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Velosgames.ulife
